text: Ceratozamia zaragozae is a species of plant in the family Zamiaceae. It is endemic to the Rio Verde in El Capulín, San Luis Potosí state in northeastern Mexico. It is a Critically endangered species, threatened by habitat loss. It is found southwest of the Rio Verde, in Capulin district. ==References== zaragozae Category:Endemic flora of Mexico Category:Flora of San Luis Potosí Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Endangered biota of Mexico Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ceratozamia zaragozae
